https://tmrev.io/movie/718710-Cerro de la cruz 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4n9YQ0YGo6V8Q7d9Wj4TjG1FMBL.jpg A young revolutionary on the verge of death finds himself trapped in his desires for love. His feelings in the midst of war are clarified when he discovers that he wants to love and be loved by another man. This short film questions the notions of hatred that arise in homophobic coexistence. Cerro de la cruz
